content.name: CSS
rules: In the 1st round, an on-the-spot task will be given for designing using CSS.
Teams qualified are moved to next round.
Round 1 qualification based on jury's decision.
In round 2 Web page with graphics will be displayed. Participants have to replicate the same web page within a time limit of 20 minutes.Participants should code only using NotePad.
Winners will be awarded and participation certificate will be provided.
